item.title: BBC threatens AI firm with legal action over unauthorised content use - BBC
item.description:
1. BBC threatens AI firm with legal action over unauthorised content use  BBC
  2. BBC threatens legal action against AI startup Perplexity over content scraping, FT reports  Reuters
  3. BBC threatens legal action against AI startup over content scraping  The Guardian
  4. BBC threatens legal action against AI start-up Perplexity over content scraping  Financial Times
  5. BBC sues Perplexity for content theft as Apple considers buying the AI outfit  Fudzilla.com
